name: Block Puzzle: Board Games
description:
Block Puzzle - Classic wood block puzzle game, is a combination of sudoku and block puzzle. BlockuDoku is a kind of sudoku game with classic and woody puzzles. Train your brain and Download now!
Block Puzzle - Classic wood block puzzle game, which also named BlockuDoku is a classic addictive wooden style block puzzle game. Match blocks to complete lines and squares to get them removed. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in a block puzzle game!
Block Puzzle - Classic wood block puzzle game (BlockuDoku) challenges you to fit blocks of different shapes into a 10×10 grid. Match blocks and beat your high score. Challenge yourself with wood block puzzles at your own pace.

Block Puzzle - Classic wood block puzzle game (BlockuDoku) Features：
Fit Blocks of different shapes into a 10×10 grid
Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks
Easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit to play classic wood block puzzle game
Free to play classic and woody puzzle game
Master the block puzzle game by destroying several elements with just one move
Play it when you are bored or want to train your brain – any time, anywhere

Privacy Policy - https://bestblockgame.com/PrivacyPolicy.html
Terms of Use - https://bestblockgame.com/terms-use.html

Train your brain with classic and woody puzzles.
Download free and start your adventure of Block Puzzles. 
Challenge yourself with wood block puzzle game.
